S02mahpratu:1127: yathā candramaṇḍalam amṛtena prabhavatāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ kāyaṃ prahlādayati tathā dharmāmṛtena sarvasattvānāṃ cittasaṃtānāni prahlādayiṣyati /
S02mahpratu:1128: sarvaduṣṭayakṣarākṣasabhūtapretapiśācāpasmāraḍākinīgrahavighnavināyakādayaḥ sarve 'sya mahāpratisaravidyārājaprabhāvena na śaktā viheṭhanāṃ kartum /
S02mahpratu:1129: upasaṃkramatāṃ ca teṣām ayaṃ mahāvidyārājā smartavyā /
S02mahpratu:1130: tatas te sarvaduṣṭacittā vidyādharasya vaśyā ājñāśravaṇavidheyā bhavanti /
S02mahpratu:1131: asyā evānubhāvena yad uta mahāpratisarāvidyārājñyā na cāsya śatrubhayaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S02mahpratu:1132: anatikramaṇīyaś ca bhaviṣyati sarvaśatrugaṇai rājarājamahāmātyair brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiś ca /
S02mahpratu:1133: antaśo 'pi ca vadhyārho vadhakapuruṣair ucchritāny api śastrāṇi khaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ gacchanti pāṃsumayānīva viśīryante /
S02mahpratu:1136: [48] rakṣoghnaṃ paramaṃ hy etat pavitraṃ pāpanāśanam /
S02mahpratu:1140: strīpuṃsayoḥ parā rakṣā vidyeyaṃ hi mahābalā /
S02mahpratu:1143: patha utpatham āpanna etāṃ vidyām anusmaret // 4 //
S02mahpratu:1144: panthānaṃ labhate śīghraṃ bhojanaṃ pānam uttamam /
S02mahpratu:1145: kāyena manasā vācā yat kṛtaṃ pūrvajanmasu // 5 //
S02mahpratu:1146: aśubhaṃ bahuvidhaṃ kiṃcit tat sarvaṃ kṣapayiṣyati /
S02mahpratu:1147: smaraṇād dhāraṇāc caiva udgrahāl lekhanād api // 6 //
S02mahpratu:1150: evaṃ hi dharmarase prāpte pāpā gacchanti saṃkṣayam /
S02mahpratu:1151: sidhyante sarvakāryāṇi manasā yad yad īpsitam // 8 //
S02mahpratu:1153: rājāgnir udakaṃ caiva vidyud vā taskaro 'pi vā // 9 //
S02mahpratu:1155: te sarve pralayaṃ yānti vidyāyā lakṣajāpataḥ // 10 //
S02mahpratu:1158: sarveṣu caiva sthāneṣu imāṃ vidyāṃ prayojayet /
S02mahpratu:1160: sidhyanty ayatnatas tāni vidyāto nātra saṃśayaḥ /
S02mahpratu:1164: caturaḥ pūrṇakumbhāṃś ca sthāpayed vidhinā budhaḥ // 2 //
S02mahpratu:1165: puṣpāṇy avakiret tatra dhūpayed dhūpam uttamam /
S02mahpratu:1167: pūrvavad gandhapuṣpāṃś ca dadyāc cātra vidhānavit /
S02mahpratu:1168: catasras tīrikāḥ sthāpyāḥ sarvāś ca paṭṭabaddhikāḥ // 4 //
S02mahpratu:1172: saptaśo japtayā cāsya rakṣāṃ kuryād vicakṣaṇaḥ // 6 //
S02mahpratu:1175: bhūyaś ca sapta vārān vai balikumbhasumantritam /
S02mahpratu:1177: ity evaṃ dakṣiṇe pārśve kṣipeta sapta eva tu /
S02mahpratu:1178: paścimāyāṃ ca saptaiva uttarāyāṃ tathā diśi // 9 //
S02mahpratu:1179: adha ūrdhvaṃ tu saptaiva kṛtā rakṣā bhaviṣyati /
S02mahpratu:1182: nāsty asyāḥ parā kācid rakṣāvidyā tridhātuke // 11 //
S02mahpratu:1183: [50] na tasya mṛtyur na jarā na rogo
S02mahpratu:1195: [51] vajrapāṇiś ca yakṣendra indraś caiva śacīpatiḥ /
S02mahpratu:1198: te ca sarve mahānāgā devatā ṛṣayas tathā // 2 //
S02mahpratu:1199: asurā garuḍā gandharvāḥ kiṃnarāś ca mahoragāḥ /
S02mahpratu:1201: likhitāṃ dhārayet prājño bāhau baddhvā maharddhikām /
S02mahpratu:1202: mahatīṃ labhate pūjāṃ saṃpadaṃ cāpi nityaśaḥ // 4 //
S02mahpratu:1203: [52] idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te ca bhikṣavas te ca bodhisattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti /
